ygData.subject: Re: Banks
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree, Verant needs to spend a little time getting economy going. A few changes, and it would be awsome. But, if they did what you are talking about with the
ygData.messageBody:
I agree, Verant needs to spend a little time getting economy going. A few
changes, and it would be awsome. But, if they did what you are talking about
with the giving stuff thru bank accounts, what would the Shamans and
Necromancers do about there spells that allow them to send items to other
players. Plus, the economy for some things would be ruined. In Qeynos, banded
armor goes for a ton more than it does in Freeport. With being able to
transfer, this would be gone, and all the smith who travel to Qeynos to make
a killing would then not be able to do that, and the need for travel would be
gone.

Kondor, Half Elf Paladin
~Veeshan~
